name: The Death of Avery Wright
description:
Avery Wright, a controversial author, was murdered in a secret meeting with fans. Find the killer before the night is over!

Clicking on the shelves/tables is how you examine them. When you exhaust a character's dialogue you can chose to accuse them or not. The result of your decision there will determine what ending you get.

This is a small mystery visual novel made in 48 hours for a game jam.
